channel.title: LACHESIS on SR-C
channel.description: Recent content in LACHESIS on SR-C

item.title: LACHESIS安装
item.description: 系统依赖 LACHESIS的系统依赖有 gcc, the C++ compiler (http://gcc.gnu.org/) The zlib compression library (http://www.zlib.net/) The boost C++ libraries (http://www.boost.org/) The SAMtools toolkit for handling SAM/BAM files (http://samtools.sourceforge.net/) (make sure to use version 0.1.19 or older) 其中，boost的版本应该高于1.52.0
